text: Ruchir Mahajan (born 7 February 1982) is a Filipino cricketer who plays for the Philippines cricket team. In March 2019, he was named in the Philippines squad for the Regional Finals of the 2018–19 ICC T20 World Cup East Asia- Pacific Qualifier tournament. He made his Twenty20 International (T20I) debut for the Philippines against Papua New Guinea on 22 March 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino cricketers Category:Philippines Twenty20 International cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ruchir Mahajan
